alert.note: Alert for Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dale, southwestern Henry, northeastern Geneva, Houston and southwestern Early Counties through 730 PM EDT/630 PM CDT/... At 642 PM EDT/542 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Slocomb to 10 miles west of Donalsonville. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Cottonwood, Headland, Dothan, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, Columbia, Pinckard, Malvern, Rehobeth and Clayhatchee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
